name: Fantasy Animal
description: A template for creating charming magical creatures.
base_prompt: a charming [animal] with [magical_feature], in the style of [art_style]
example_values: animal: a red panda, magical_feature: glowing runes, art_style: Studio Ghibli

name: Cyberpunk Portrait
description: A template for neon-lit character portraits.
example_values: subject: a hacker, cybernetics: a glowing optical implant, location: a crowded ramen bar, lighting: cinematic neon

name: Epic Fantasy Landscape
description: A template for vast, awe-inspiring landscapes.
base_prompt: epic landscape of [location], with [weather], during [time_of_day], fantasy art
example_values: location: the floating mountains, weather: a meteor shower, time_of_day: twilight

name: Cozy Interior
description: A template for warm, inviting interior scenes.
example_values: room_type: living room, architecture_style: Scandinavian, lighting: soft ambient, time_of_day: rainy evening

name: Sci-Fi Vehicle
description: A template for designing futuristic vehicles.
example_values: vehicle_type: hover car, material: carbon fiber, propulsion_type: anti-gravity, environment: a futuristic highway

name: Character Concept
description: A template for character design sheets.
example_values: character_description: young elf archer, outfit: forest camouflage, pose: aiming a bow, style: concept art

name: Product Shot
description: A template for clean, professional product photography.
base_prompt: product photography of a [product], [product_type], [lighting], professional studio shot
example_values: product: a ceramic mug, product_type: kitchenware, lighting: softbox lighting

name: Historical Portrait
description: A template for portraits from specific historical eras.
example_values: figure_description: a noblewoman, profession: queen, era: Renaissance, setting: a castle hall

name: Abstract Concept
description: A template for visualizing abstract ideas.
example_values: concept: innovation, color_palette: blue and silver, shapes: geometric, mood: futuristic

name: Post-Apocalyptic Scene
description: A template for desolate, abandoned environments.
example_values: location: a city street, condition: overgrown, weather: hazy, time_of_day: golden hour

name: Magical Artifact
description: A template for mystical objects and items.
example_values: artifact_type: an ancient amulet, material: enchanted gold, magical_effect: a glowing aura, style: intricate detailing

name: Urban Sketch
description: A template for loose, artistic cityscapes.
example_values: city_element: a street cafe, drawing_style: watercolor, medium: ink and wash, time_of_day: morning

name: Gourmet Food
description: A template for appetizing food photography.
example_values: dish: chocolate lava cake, cuisine: French pastry, garnish: raspberry coulis, lighting: warm and soft

name: Mythological Scene
description: A template for scenes from myths and legends.
example_values: mythological_being: Zeus, creature: a cyclops, action: battling with lightning, setting: Mount Olympus

name: Steampunk Machine
description: A template for intricate steampunk devices.
example_values: device_type: a flying machine, material: brass and copper, mechanisms: gears and steam, purpose: personal transportation

name: Album Cover
description: A template for music album artwork.
example_values: genre: synthwave, mood: nostalgic, art_style: retro vaporwave, era: 1980s

name: Botanical Illustration
description: A template for detailed plant and flower images.
example_values: plant: a rare orchid, season: spring, style: scientific illustration, lighting: soft natural light

name: Underwater Scene
description: A template for aquatic and oceanic environments.

name: Desert Landscape
description: A template for arid, sandy environments.

name: Movie Poster
description: A template for cinematic movie poster designs.
